title: zz Signal Slot
description:
Zz Signal Slot let you can connect signal(delegate) and slot(function) in editor;After setting signal object , signal's delegate method and slot object, it will display all functions  fit the delegate ,make you easy to choose.

It is good for independence of component. You can use it in GUI,collision, or any other event.

Example and discussion in Unity forum

Homepage
changes:
1.11
Rename the GameObject in example scene, make it easy to see.
